meaning_str.bing:
v. 添加；增加；补充说；继续说
abbr. (=American Dialect Dictionary)美国方言词典

添加；增加；补充说；继续说

增加；增添；添加；补充；补充说；继续说；加；累计；相加；把…相加；做加法；混合；把…计算在内；包括；提升
（ADD）多动症；注意力缺陷障碍（attention deficit disorder的缩写）

sogou-kaoyan.v: 增加; 添加[出现11次)];补充说[出现4次)];加; 做加法[出现0次)]
sogou-kaoyan.phr: (add up to)总计为; 结果是[出现1次)]

sogou-CET6.v: 增加[出现39次)];补充说; 继续说[出现3次)];合计; 做加法[出现0次)]

sogou-CET4.v: 增加[出现19次)];补充说[出现15次)];合计; 做加法[出现0次)]

sogou-gaokao.v: 补充说[出现5次)];增加[出现3次)];合计; 做加法[出现1次)]

sogou-zhongkao.v: 增加[出现73次)];补充说[出现33次)];合计; 做加法[出现1次)]

1.en: Add a bit of understanding, loads of love and trust to make your relationship withstand the tests of time.
1.cn: 只需一些理解，爱和信任，你们的关系便一定能经得起时间的考验！

2.en: Please sign in and add your comments below and tell us what you think about the WCF PRO concept.
2.cn: 请登录并添加您的评论如下，请告诉我们您想周转基金专业概念。

3.en: Add steamed lotus seeds and bring to boil. Remove from the fire, add white sugar, ready to serve.
3.cn: 加入蒸熟的莲子、再次煮开。熄火、加入适量白糖、开动！

0.en: And when Jim wanted to really spice things up , he'd add, yep, clip art.
0.cn: 当Jim想要尝试添加乐趣，他加了，恩，对，美工图案。

1.en: And then I add a dark mat brown, a mat dark brown eye shadow from trio.
1.cn: 然后我要从这三种里面添加深哑光棕色，不对，是哑光深棕色眼影。

2.en: What? She can't do that. Well, technically, she can add any condition she wants. Fine. Then you hand the petal to Miguel.
2.cn: 什么？她不能那样做，理论上讲，她可以添加任何条件。好吧。现在你把花瓣给他。

3.en: But this still doesn't add up to 100%.
3.cn: 可是这样的组成结构还是未能达到100%。

4.en: Miss Denker, can you add anything? No.
4.cn: 丹可小姐，你有什么要补充的吗？没有。

5.en: I'm going add the whole bottle, I think.

6.en: A nice, shiny dime to add to your collection.
6.cn: 给你的收藏中添一枚亮闪闪的硬币。

7.en: I'd like to add something on a personal note.

8.en: Perhaps I can add some pertinent information.
8.cn: 也许我可以提供些相关信息。

9.en: Ohh, okay. Something didn't quite add up there.

10.en: I'm going to add the marinade now. Just a little.
10.cn: 我现在要把酱汁加进去了，加一点就好。

11.en: So the next thing I'm going to add is some water.

12.en: Mix the noodles in well, add a little bit of the stock.
12.cn: 把面拌均匀，加一点高汤。

13.en: And, I might add, we are doing it with the utmost respect.
13.cn: 而且容我说明 我们是怀着最大的敬意的。

14.en: Now, I add an egg. Now, the milk. And I give it all a stir.
14.cn: 现在，我要加一个鸡蛋。现在，牛奶。我要搅拌一下。

15.en: Hey, I got new boots this year. Guaranteed to add three inches.
15.cn: 喂，我今年新买了靴子好吧，保证能增高三英寸。

16.en: Actually, I was wondering if I could add a third new chess piece.
16.cn: 实际上我在琢磨我能不能再加一个新的棋子。

17.en: Secondly, that I am convinced it will add greatly to my happiness.
17.cn: 其次，我深信结婚会大大地促进我的幸福。

18.en: For astronauts orbiting the Earth for 800 days, it starts to add up.
18.cn: 如果宇航员们环绕地球800天，其影响就会明显。

19.en: Spread each slice with butter and marmalade. Add a layer of sultanas.
19.cn: 每一片上涂满黄油和果酱，加一层葡萄干。
